attributes.action: Give All Petitions Very Serious Consideration Regardless of the Number of Supporters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The best proposals will not always have the greatest support.  The best proposals will be the ones that have few objection and no serious objections.  And the best proposals will be ones where any objections can be overcome.  So please consider all proposals carefully and see if you can find ways of satisfying the concerns of most if not all citizens.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
